action.action-desc: Mr. Matheson (for himself and Mr. Dent) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration

form.official-title: To amend the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to eliminate straight-party voting from any voting system used for Federal elections.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the People Before Party Act of 2013.

section.header: Elimination of straight-party voting in Federal elections
section.text: Section 301(a)(6) of the Help America Vote Act of 2002 (42 U.S.C. 15481(a)(6)) is amended by striking the period at the end of the sentence and inserting , except that no State may provide a voter with the opportunity to indicate the selection of a political party as a representation of the selection of an individual candidate..
